languages.text: Похоже, капитан "Рассекающего тьму" ждал от вас именно такого решения.

traits.locale_text: Похоже, капитан "Рассекающего тьму" ждал от вас именно такого решения.

languages.text: It looks like this was the exact decision the captain of the Darkpiercer expected you to make.
languages.original_text: Похоже, капитан "Рассекающего тьму" ждал от вас именно такого решения.

traits.locale_text: It looks like this was the exact decision the captain of the Darkpiercer expected you to make.

It looks like this was the exact decision the captain of the Darkpiercer expected you to make.

languages.text: 看起来，黑暗穿刺者号的舰长正希望你能做出这样的决定。
languages.original_text: It looks like this was the exact decision the captain of the Darkpiercer expected you to make.

traits.locale_text: 看起来，黑暗穿刺者号的舰长正希望你能做出这样的决定。

languages.text: Parece que el capitán del Perforador de Tinieblas esperaba que tomaras exactamente esta decisión.
languages.original_text: It looks like this was the exact decision the captain of the Darkpiercer expected you to make.

traits.locale_text: Parece que el capitán del Perforador de Tinieblas esperaba que tomaras exactamente esta decisión.

languages.text: ダークピアサー号の船長が期待したのは、まさにこの決断だったようだ。
languages.original_text: It looks like this was the exact decision the captain of the Darkpiercer expected you to make.

traits.locale_text: ダークピアサー号の船長が期待したのは、まさにこの決断だったようだ。

languages.text: Offenbar hat der Captain der Darkpiercer genau diese Entscheidung von dir erwartet.
languages.original_text: It looks like this was the exact decision the captain of the Darkpiercer expected you to make.

traits.locale_text: Offenbar hat der Captain der Darkpiercer genau diese Entscheidung von dir erwartet.

languages.text: Il semble que c'était exactement la décision que le capitaine du Perçombre espérait vous voir prendre.
languages.original_text: It looks like this was the exact decision the captain of the Darkpiercer expected you to make.

traits.locale_text: Il semble que c'était exactement la décision que le capitaine du Perçombre espérait vous voir prendre.

languages.text: Bu kararın, Gölgedeşen kaptanının tam da beklediği şey olduğu görülüyor.
languages.original_text: It looks like this was the exact decision the captain of the Darkpiercer expected you to make.
